text: Ami ratri o dinake duti nidarsana karechi. Atahpara nisprabha kare diyechi ratera nidarsana ebam dinera nidarsanake dekhara upayogi karechi, yate tomara tomadera palanakartara anugraha anbesana kara ebam yate tomara sthira karate para bacharasamuhera ganana o hisaba ebam ami saba bisayake bistarita bhabe barnana karechi.
